title: Richard Epstein on Classical Liberalism, Libertarianism, and Lochner
description: Richard Epstein, of New York University and Stanford University's Hoover Institution, talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the differences between classical liberalism and hard-line libertarianism. What is the proper role of the state? Topics discussed include the Constitution, prudent regulation, contract enforcement, intellectual property, and the Supreme Court case, Lochner vs. NY.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
